Radeland 28, D-22927 Großhansdorf, Germany Tel.: ++49 160 535 9865
Experience
11/2019 - 12/2021	EU Affairs Manager, ExxonMobil Brussels
EU Green Deal Advocacy for Natural Gas (incl. Blue Hydrogen, LNG und CCS) and Circular Economy Action Plans for Plastic Waste / Chemical Recycling
ExxonMobil go to contact for EU Commission, EU Parliament, EU Council and selected EU countries (EU Transparency Register No. 0745650927-75), plus Stakeholder Management
Representing ExxonMobil in European and Global Associations such as: International Association of Oil and Gas Producers (IOGP), Gas Naturally Europe, American Chamber of Commerce, Plastics Europe and, Alliance to End Plastic Waste
03/2016 - 10/2019	Global Engagement Manager / Communications Director IOGP London
Advocacy for the International Oil Radeland 28, D-22927 Großhansdorf, Germany Tel.: ++49 160 535 9865
Experience
11/2019 - 12/2021	EU Affairs Manager, ExxonMobil Brussels
EU Green Deal Advocacy for Natural Gas (incl. Blue Hydrogen, LNG und CCS) and Circular Economy Action Plans for Plastic Waste / Chemical Recycling
ExxonMobil go to contact for EU Commission, EU Parliament, EU Council and selected EU countries (EU Transparency Register No. 0745650927-75), plus Stakeholder Management
Representing ExxonMobil in European and Global Associations such as: International Association of Oil and Gas Producers (IOGP), Gas Naturally Europe, American Chamber of Commerce, Plastics Europe and, Alliance to End Plastic Waste
03/2016 - 10/2019	Global Engagement Manager / Communications Director IOGP London
Advocacy for the International Oil and Gas Industry (seconded from ExxonMobil) at global Conferences such as COP, G20/B20 and OECD, incl. Speeches and Moderation.
Establishing IOGP Directorate Communication, incl. Media, Social Media und Advocacy
Coordination with Global Industry Associations, Global Investment Groups (topic: ESG) and 80 IOGP member companies, representing more than half of the Global Oil and Gas Market
08/1999 – 02/2016  	Various Public Affairs Leadership Positions, ExxonMobil Hamburg
Establishing and Leading ExxonMobil’s German Government Relations Department with Government contacts on Federal, State and Commune Level.
Public Affairs and Communication representing the brands ExxonMobil, Esso and Mobil1, incl. Key Notes in Germany on ExxonMobil’s Global Energy Outlook
Media Head for Esso in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Senior Staff member since 7/2014
02/1992 – 07/1999	Advisor Controls, Reporting and SAP Implementation at Esso A.G.  					in Hamburg, Brüssel, Florham Park (NJ, USA)
Education/ Competences
Economist: Diplom-Volkswirt (University Hamburg 1993), Betriebswirt (Hamburg School of Business Administration, 1987), Industriekaufmann (1986), Abitur (1984)
Military Service at Bundeswehr University Hamburg (S1 Stab, 1989)
Englisch, German, Slovak (A2), Rotary Member

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
